description: This file defines a Python class 'GoogleCalendarTools' that provides methods to interact with Google Calendar API, including listing and creating events. It includes authentication handling via decorators and manages OAuth credentials.

classes.name: GoogleCalendarTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with Google Calendar API, including listing and creating calendar events with OAuth2 authentication.

methods.name: list_events
methods.description: Lists upcoming events from the user's primary Google Calendar, with optional limit and start date.

methods.name: create_event
methods.description: Creates a new event in the user's primary Google Calendar with specified details such as time, title, description, location, attendees, and optional Google Meet link.
